name: Club Chaos
description:
Club Chaos! 

In this rythm game you have to make your way across the dance floor by both staying on the beat and on the path.

How to: Use WASD or you arrow keys to follow the path when the arrow at the top of your screen is at the circles.
----------------------------------→

For the Gamejam 2022:
This game was coded with C++ by @xTacobaco (CUSTOM ENGINE)

The ART was made by @Mystrix404
The Sound & Music was made by @Liolei
The Programming was made by @xTacobaco

Engine: https://github.com/xTacobaco/GameJam-Engine

Was Made By Using: Aseprite, LDtk, Adobe Photoshop, Logic Pro, Custom Engine
----------------------------------→

This was challenging since the game was made with a Custom Engine and was very limiting and hard. This was a blast and a challenge for us! we had fun and hope y'all like it! <3
